schema.description: Statistics of PWE3 ping and trace tests.

ping-results.description: List of PWE3 ping test results.

ping-result.description: Statistics of PWE3 ping test result.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-average.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

probes.description: List of PWE3 ping results of all packets in a test.

probe.description: Statistics of probe result of a single packet in a PWE3 ping test.

sequence.description: Serial number of a test packet received.

replier.description: Reply address in a received response packet.

data-bytes.description: Number of bytes in a received response packet.

rtt.description: RTT of test packets, expressed in milliseconds.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either Success or Timeout.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

trace-results.description: List of PWE3 trace test results.

trace-result.description: Statistics of PWE3 trace test result.

hops.description: List of PWE3 trace result of each packet in a test.

hop.description: Statistics of PWE3 trace result of a single packet in a test.

replier.description: Reply address of the related hop in a test.

rtt.description: RTT of test packets, expressed in milliseconds.

ds-address.description: Downstream address of the related hop in a test.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either Success or Timeout.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

label-index.description: The index of the downstream label.
